item.title: Swiss skier Franjo von Allmen wins first gold medal of Milano Cortina Games
item.description: The second gold medal of the Milano Cortina Games was awarded to Frida Karlsson of Sweden in the women's 10km+10km skiathlon.

item.title: Best books for Valentine's Day
item.description: Sarah Gelman, editorial director at Amazon Books, joins "CBS Saturday Morning" to recommend some of the best books to read around Valentine's Day.

item.title: Chef and author Noor Murad on her latest cookbook
item.description: Noor Murad's latest cookbook is a love letter to the Middle Eastern flavors she is known for using in her dishes.
